class.name: PlayerAchievementQuery
class.brief_description: A query builder for player achievements.
class.description: The PlayerAchievementQuery class allows constructing queries for fetching player achievements from the Torii indexer, supporting filtering by namespaces, player addresses, and world addresses.

method.name: namespaces
method.description: Sets the namespaces to filter by.

method.name: player_addresses
method.description: Sets the player addresses to filter by.

method.name: world_addresses
method.description: Sets the world addresses to filter by.
